thread.title: Here's Doom Being Played on Apple Watch and Apple TV
thread.title_full: Here's Doom Being Played on Apple Watch and Apple TV - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Here's Doom Being Played on Apple Watch and Apple TV
text: Well, Apple Watch and TV aren't devices made for gaming, certainly not Apple Watch. But this hasn't stopped Facebook developers Lior Tubi and Mehdi Mulani to perform a 10-hour hackathon and get Doom to run on a watchOS 2-enabled Apple Watch. Not entirely surprising, since what people needed back in the day to run Doom, a full desktop PC, now fits nicely at your wrist. The way the team managed to port the game on a watchOS 2 doesn't fail to impress, however.... Â»
